CalculateField focalnodes ID SequentialNumber() "Python 3" "# Calculates a sequential number # More calculator examples at esriurl.com/CalculatorExamples rec=0 def SequentialNumber(): global rec pStart = 1 pInterval = 1 if (rec == 0): rec = pStart else: rec = rec + pInterval return rec" "Short (16-bit integer)" NO_ENFORCE_DOMAINS
Buffer focalnodes C:\GIS_Course\Dissertation\DataPreparation\Default.gdb\focalnodes_Buffer "20000 Meters" Full Round "Dissolve all output features into a single feature" # Planar

ExportFeatures focalnodes_Buffer C:\GIS_Course\MScThesis-MaviSantarelli\data\StudyArea\Buffer.shp # NOT_USE_ALIAS "Shape_Length "Shape_Length" false true true 8 Double 0 0,First,#,focalnodes_Buffer,Shape_Length,-1,-1;Shape_Area "Shape_Area" false true true 8 Double 0 0,First,#,focalnodes_Buffer,Shape_Area,-1,-1" #

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Area of feature in internal units squared.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.
